roleset.name: to have reference, relate

example.name: transitive
example.text: However , it gave the shareholders the right [*] to pursue a small portion of their claim that [*T*]pertains to Lisa 's disk drive , known [*] as Twiggy .
example.arg: Lisa 's disk drive , known [*] as Twiggy

roleset.note: PERTAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pertain' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pertain.01-v predicate notes)
